data.name: EMAIL_INVALID
data.value: This is not a valid e-mail

data.name: RECIPE_DIFFICULTY_NOT_IN_ENUM
data.value: Recipe difficulty must be one of the defined values

data.name: RECIPE_COOKING_TIME_NOT_IN_ENUM
data.value: Recipe cooking time must be one of the defined values

data.name: RECIPE_INGREDIENT_NOT_EMPTY
data.value: Each ingredient must not be empty

data.name: RECIPE_INSTRUCTION_STEP_GREATER_THAN_0
data.value: Instruction step must be greater than 0

data.name: RECIPE_INSTRUCTION_TEXT_NOT_EMPTY
data.value: Instruction text must not be empty

data.name: RECIPE_INSTRUCTION_TEXT_LESS_THAN_2000
data.value: Instruction text must be less than 2000 characters

data.name: RECIPE_INSTRUCTION_DUPLICATE_STEP_INSTRUCTION
data.value: Each instruction step must be unique

data.name: RECIPE_DISH_TYPE_NOT_IN_ENUM
data.value: Dish type must be one of the defined values

data.name: RECIPE_AT_LEAST_ONE_INGREDIENT
data.value: Recipe ingredients must not be empty

data.name: RECIPE_NUMBER_GREATER_THAN_0
data.value: Number of recipes must be greater than zero

data.name: RECIPE_INGREDIENT_INVALID_SEPARATORS
data.value: Ingredients must only contain words separated by spaces. Invalid separators like `-`, `/`, or `_` are not allowed

data.name: RECIPE_INGREDIENT_INVALID_START_CHARACTER
data.value: Ingredients must start with a valid number, fraction, or word

data.name: RECIPE_INGREDIENT_INVALID_CHARACTER
data.value: Ingredients must only contain letters, numbers, and spaces. Special characters are not allowed, except in fractions like `3/4`

data.name: IMAGE_INVALID_TYPE
data.value: Only types .jpg and .png are accepted as images
